showDataTipOnCursorMove.title: Show datatip automatically on 'cursor' stay
showDataTipOnCursorMove.description: If set to true, the data tip is shown as soon as you move your cursor stays on a word. Otherwise you will have to activate it via keypress.

showDataTipOnMouseMove.description: If set to true, the data tip is shown as soon as mouse hovers on a word.
showDataTipOnMouseMove.title: Show datatip automatically on 'mouse' hover

hoverTime.title: Hover/Stay Time
hoverTime.description: The time that the mouse/cursor should hover/stay to show a datatip. Also specifies the time that the datatip is still shown when the mouse/cursor moves [ms].
